section.title: Uninstallation
section.para: CMM ships with uninstallers for automatically uninstalling the CMM software components.
Before uninstalling, it is recommended that you make a backup of the configuration files, log files, and the data created during operation. For details on backups, refer to .
When uninstalling the CMM software components, stick to the following sequence:

listitem.para: Uninstall the Monitoring Service and the OpenStack extensions.
Manually remove remaining CMM components if they are no longer required.
